#summary jQuery Editable Combobox changelog v1.3.0.
= 1.3.0 (2010.07.07) =
 * max input length parameter added ([http://code.google.com/p/jquery-jec/issues/detail?id=41&can=1 #41])
 * fixed problems with YUI compression ([http://code.google.com/p/jquery-jec/issues/detail?id=44&can=1 #44])
 * fixed problems with optgroups
